entry.tran: 重新定居;移居;重新安置
entry.def: Resettlement is the process of moving people to a different place to live, because they are no longer allowed to stay in the area where they used to live.

means.word_mean: 1. the transportation of people (as a family or colony) to a new settlement (as after an upheaval of some kind)
